title: HoP 175 - Bright Ideas - Illuminationism
itunes:title: HoP 175 - Bright Ideas - Illuminationism
description: The Illuminationists carry on Suhrawardī’s critique of “Peripatetic” philosophy and wonder if they will be reborn as giraffes.
